displayName.english: Ain't Nobody Got Time for That

description.english: Spend 500 Food to speed up time while sleeping

description.koreana: 자는 중 시간 빨리 감기에 음식 500개 소모
description.spanish: Gasta 500 de comida para acelerar el tiempo mientras duermes

description.english: Remove Poison from yourself or your followers 10 times
